story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_0300:
You’re Team Plasma, right? What are you trying to
do on this island?
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_0400:
Are you really going to steal Pokémon?
Answer me!
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_0600: Be quiet! What an annoying child!
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_1100: It’s OK... I’m not your enemy.
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_1300: I’m Hugh. I have a history with Team Plasma.
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_1400:
They took my sister’s Pokémon five years ago, and
now they’ve taken mine.
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_1700:
I overheard them talking about stealing Pokémon,
so I followed them.
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_1800:
I’ve got to escape and save my partner and the
other Pokémon they stole as soon as possible.
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_2000: You resent Team Plasma, don’t you?
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_2100: It’s not really resentment. I’m just angry!
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_2200:
These people have no qualms about just stealing
other peoples’ Pokémon... That’s unacceptable!
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_2300: I’m gonna shut down Team Plasma’s evil plans!
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_2400:
(As the king of Team Plasma, I persistently asked
people to release their Pokémon.)
story_teamplasma_01_05000/2401_1001_2500:
(Because of what I did, some people lost their
precious Pokémon... Hugh and his family must’ve
also been affected.)
